summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing acceptance of a United States Department of Justice, Law Enforcement Assistance Administration, Office of Criminal Justice Programs discretionary grant award contract for an "Integrated Criminal Apprehension Program", establishing certain positions in the Seattle Police Department, amending the 1980 City of Seattle Criminal Justice Plan (Resolution 26047 and C.F. 287837), making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
